game.name: Dubai Drift 4x4 Simulator 3D
game.description:
Many love driving a crazy 4x4 jeep on the deserted land. Are you one of those who are also looking forward to explore your wild driving side on the desert location in Dubai? Join Dubai Drift 4x4 Simulator 3D and be prepared to sit behind the wheel and drive a realistic truck at high speed in deserts! Grab your favourite 4x4 Jeep and get ready to enter the amazing racing world! There are many exciting missions to unlock in this brand new 3D racing challenge.

Keep your eyes on the clock and try to grab all the checkpoints before your time expires to stay in the game! All you need to do is just tighten your seat belt and allow yourself to drive it like a pro driver. Keep collecting all the points you spot along the way with the help of arrow continuously shown on the screen! Use your insane driving skills to reach every destination before time runs out! Track your speed and how much time is left by having a look at the top left corner of the screen in this HTML5 car game!

Complete tasks to earn the gold coins and unlock new exciting 4X4 models when you progress in this car driving simulator! The complexities and challenges will keep getting tougher as you move forward. Common boys! We know that you are skilled enough to handle an exciting adventure in different improved custom jeeps. Enjoy the best car race game online for free without download. Create your best score and challenge your friends to see who is best in the 3d 4x4 simulator Dubai Drift!
